fields.name: segment
fields.description: Identifier of segment in sequence of measurement blocks

fields.name: run_description
fields.description: Description of the run or a group of segments

fields.name: temperature_units
fields.description: Units of temperature; K = Kelvin, C = Celsius

fields.name: temperature
fields.description: Temperature of the measurement in Kelvin units

fields.name: pressure_units
fields.description: Units of pressure measurements. Acceptable values: log10(mmHg), mmHg, relative

fields.name: uncertainty
fields.description: Uncertainty in final digit of adsorption measurement

fields.name: branch
fields.description: Identifier for isotherm branch. Either 'A' (adsorption) or 'D' (desorption)

fields.name: notes
fields.description: Comments, either taken from original data or editorial notes
